Mulled Apple Juice
Cups
2 liters apple juice
2 cinnamon sticks
3 tablespoons dark brown sugar (or to taste)
5 cloves
zest of 1 orange
zest of 1/2 lemon
1/2 orange, sliced
1/2 lemon sliced
2 star anise
6 allspice berries
2 tablespoons dried cranberries
100ml brandy (or to taste)
  1. Heat everything except the alcohol in a pan, just below boiling for at least 20 minutes
  2. Add the brandy, and serve
